body_html:
My apologies. As @martinwicke figured, I was using an old version of bazel (0.1.4).

Upgrading to 0.2.3 resolved the error.

If there's any other info I can add here that you think might be useful for people who stumble on this thread in the future, let me know. And thanks for the help.
body_text:

body:
My apologies.  As @martinwicke figured, I was using an old version of bazel (0.1.4). 

Upgrading to 0.2.3 resolved the error.

If there's any other info I can add here that you think might be useful for people who stumble on this thread in the future, let me know.  And thanks for the help.
